item.description:
Enneagram Workshop

Herb acts out the 9 Enneagram types with hats and props, helps you find your core type and points out growth and relationships dynamics with each type. Often attended by singles and it's a great way to understand what types you are drawn too and what types may be a challenge.

7-10pm

Cost $40, sliding scale to $20

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram teacher and author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. He also teaches workshops on the Myers Briggs, communication skills, personal growth and spiritual development. Herb is a relationship coach and therapist and does presentations and trainings in organizations, groups, churches, schools and growth centers.

781 648 3737
www.herbpearce.com
for a complete list of workshops and services
herb@herbpearce.com
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop
